titles: The west-country weaver: containing his sorrowful lamentation for the hardship which he undergoes by a proud imperious wife: together, with his resolution to reclaim her by the well-approved oil of holly. To the tune of If love's a sweet passion, &c. Licensed according to order.
publisher: Printed for C. Bates at the Bible ...,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Good people I marry'd a turbulent wife ..."
Imperfect: trimmed and torn affecting imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
